jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have:
- 5+ years experience in Python
- Strong background in distributed systems
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
- Experience with modern web frameworks

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable backend services
- Lead technical projects and mentor junior developers
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams
- Drive technical architecture decisions

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer
jobs.description:
Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to build AI-powered solutions. Requirements:
- 3+ years experience in ML/AI
- Strong Python programming skills
- Experience with PyTorch or TensorFlow
- MS/PhD in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related field
- Background in NLP is a plus

Responsibilities:
- Develop and deploy ML models
- Optimize model performance
- Work on cutting-edge AI applications
